EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Strategy Workshop_DC_Q217.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Strategy Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for registering. We look forward to seeing you on June 7. If you'd like to invite colleagues, please feel free. It's a great opportunity to learn how organizations are modernizing their software development process, and check out the day-to-day operations of agile teams that work with Pivotal Labs. Before attending the workshop you may be interested in reading Coté's booklet, Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/crafting-your-cloud-native-strategy]]> or one of our many other free eBooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks]]>. In preparation for the afternoon session, you may want to read Matt Stine’s book, Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures]]> and the referenced The Twelve-factor App <[[https://12factor.net/]]> site/document.
Don't miss out on free breakfast and a great discussion!
Date: Wednesday, June 7, 2017
Time:
9:00AM to 3:00PM
Location: Pivotal DC 1625 I St. NW | Suite 601 Washington, DC, 20006 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1625+I+St+NW+%23601,+Washington,+DC+20006/@38.9017197,-77.0397048,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89b7b7be98e02e3d:0x108c36fd70d86b11!8m2!3d38.9017197!4d-77.0375161]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Cloud-Native-Strategy-Workshop-DC.html]]>
